intro: Mechanical Design Engineer with 4.5+ years of hands-on experience in designing and commissioning industrial machines and automation systems across advanced manufacturing, CNC, robotics, and food automation.

experience.summary: Contributed to the design and development of food automation systems including IdliBot and MultiBot. Engineered high-repeatability XYZ gantry systems and automated stirring mechanisms, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure reliable and scalable machine performance.

Optimized linear drive mechanisms for automated cooking systems and designed a riveted, weld-free sheet-metal chassis. Led mechanical integration to improve manufacturability, assembly accuracy, and overall system reliability.

Designed and scaled large-format concrete 3D printing systems for construction applications. Developed CNC machines and handled end-to-end mechanical design, prototyping, and manufacturing support for additive manufacturing products.

achievements: Presented Large-Format Additive Manufacturing (LFAM) systems at IMTEX 2023, showcasing industrial-scale 3D printing technology and machine design capabilities
Published research on additive manufacturing design optimization in Scientific Reports (Nature Portfolio), based on Master's thesis work conducted at Deltasys E-Forming Pvt. Ltd.

publications.title: Design Optimization in Additive Manufacturing Systems
publications.description: Research focused on design optimization and performance improvement of large-scale additive manufacturing systems.
